text:
Miley Cyrus Confirms Marriage To Liam Hemsworth With The Most Adorable Wedding Photographs!
Miley Cyrus Confirms Marriage To Liam Hemsworth With The Most Adorable Wedding Photographs!
She is a teen idol, music inspiration and an over-achiever on so many levels. Miley Cyrus has always been outspoken and one of the most influential people. And now, the singer finally tied the knot with her long time boyfriend Liam Hemsworth over the weekend.
Twitter
There were reports of the couple making their relationship official last week and now the singer took to Instagram to announce to the world about her marriage.
Posting black and white pictures with her new husband Liam, the couple got married on 23rd December of this month. The 26-year-old posted a series of snaps with now husband from their intimate ceremony.
Don't Miss 153 SHARES 862 SHARES 346 SHARES 183 SHARES 151 SHARES
The couple first started dating after meeting on the sets of Nicholas Sparks' 2010 film "The Last Song". She even took to social media to post the most amazing captions. From writing, "10 years later", "This is probably our one millionth kiss", "23.12.2018", Miley got engaged to Liam in 2012.
Soon after, the duo broke it off and separated. But looks like, there's no stopping love. They reconnected in 2015 and announced their engagement later.
Well, big congratulations to the most adorable couple. This definitely was one of the finest weddings of 2018. What a splendid end to the year!
title: Miley Cyrus Confirms Marriage To Liam Hemsowrth With The Most Adorable Photographs
description: In one of the pictures, the duo can be seen embracing each other, with a wedding ring visible on the 28-year-old actor's finger.She posted a series of photographs of her with Hemsworth. They first started dating after meeting on the sets of Nicholas Sparks' 2010 film "The Last Song".
